text: June unemployment rates ranged from 2.5% in NE to 7.9% in CT and NM.
Twenty-two states saw three-decade peaks in annual house price growth in Q1 2021.
GDP growth between Q1 2020 and Q1 2021 ranged from -5.2% in Hawaii to 5.1% in Utah.
June leisure jobs were up in all states over the year but below prepandemic levels in most.
Among states, average private weekly earnings in June ranged from $776 in MS to $1,247 in CA.
In Q1 2021, 20 states saw manufacturing GDP exceed prepandemic levels.
Retail employment in June 2021 exceeded February 2020 levels in only 11 states.
From Q1 2020 to Q1 2021, house price increases ranged from 4.7% in HI to 23.7% in ID.
Only OK saw accommodation and food services GDP rise between Q1 2020 and Q1 2021.
In Q1 2021, 39 states saw retail GDP exceed prepandemic levels.
